title: Clive Barkers Undying
description:
Clive Barkers  
                               Undying

What doesnt kill you, will make you wish it had. 

Let Clive Barker, the prince of horror, prey on your darkest fears in a game of unparalleled terror.
1899 at the island of standing stones Jeremiah Covenant and his four younger siblings read aloud a dark
ritual that unleashes an unimaginable horror on the world. Now years later as Jeremiah lies dying 
last hope rests in the hands of his comrade Patrick Galloway.

*Master of the occult..
As Patrick Galloway you are armed with arcane magicv and a six shot weapon of forged metal.

*A tale of supernatural horror:
Survive five undying quests to unravel the undying curse of the covenant family.

*Richly detailed environments:
Explore the massive convant estate and its two parallel universes.

*Superior firepower:
Collect an explosive arsenal, including the Tibetan Cannon and harness magic spells such as 
the chattering skull.

*Two fisted combat:
Fire weapons with one hand while unleashing deadly spells with the other.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
InFo:
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Release Date: Feb 21, 2001 
ESRB: MATURE 

Minimum System Requirements:
System: PII 400 or equivalent
RAM: 64 MB
Video Memory: 16 MB
Hard Drive Space: 90 MB

Recommended System Requirements
System: PIII 500 or equivalent
RAM: 128 MB
Hard Drive Space: 610 MB 

*Compatible with  Windows 95/98/Me/Xp and Works on vista.
